revised_title: Investigation of Hygroscopic Aerosols and Their Optical Properties
tldr: This study investigates the properties of hygroscopic aerosols, focusing on their optical density and particle size. The authors examine the behavior of simple and complex smokes, providing insights into the effects of particle size and humidity on their properties. They also explore the potential applications of these findings in understanding and measuring smoke production.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Aerosol Science
